item.title: ディズニー、WBD、その他のスタジオは、必要な現金の見返りにNetflixに多くのコンテンツをライセンスしているが、最も人気のある映画や番組を控えている。
item.description:
New York Times:
Disney, WBD, and other studios are licensing more content to Netflix in return for much-needed cash, but are holding back their most popular movies and shows  —  When building their own streaming companies, many entertainment studios ended lucrative licensing deals with Netflix.

As TikTok rolls out its new Creativity Program Beta, some creators say they're frustrated by its push to become a “mini YouTube” with videos of up to 15 minutes  —  New York CNN —  —  When TikTok took off in 2020 — with short dancing or comedy clips providing much-needed entertainment …

item.title: ピューリッツァー賞を受賞したハワード・ウィーバー氏（アンカレッジ・デイリー・ニュースの元編集者、マクラッチー報道担当副社長）が膵臓癌のため73歳で死去（Tom Kizzia/Anchorage Daily News
item.description:
Tom Kizzia / Anchorage Daily News:
Pulitzer Prize winner Howard Weaver, former editor of the Anchorage Daily News and McClatchy vice president for news, dies at 73 of pancreatic cancer  —  Weaver led the Daily News through a period of remarkable growth and transformation for Anchorage and Alaska, and later became an executive with McClatchy newspapers.

item.title: アダム・モセリは、スレッド以外のアカウントのフォロー、他のプラットフォームからの返信の表示、フォロワーのポータビリティなど、スレッドのフェディバース計画について詳述している（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Adam Mosseri details Threads' fediverse plans, including following non-Threads accounts, showing replies from other platforms, and follower portability  —  The head of Instagram says a full integration with the fediverse could take ‘the better part of a year.’

item.title: アリババ・ピクチャーズがテイラー・スウィフトの公開を計画：12月31日に中国本土で劇場公開され、国営の中国電影集団が配給する（Patrick Frater/Variety）
item.description:
Patrick Frater / Variety:
Alibaba Pictures plans to release Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour in theaters in mainland China on December 31, to be distributed by state-owned China Film Group  —  “Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour” movie has cleared multiple stages of approvals and will release in mainland Chinese theaters on Dec. 31.

item.description:
Alan Rusbridger / Prospect Magazine:
The Prince Harry hacking verdict shows that newspaper management at two of the UK's biggest media companies lied to Parliament, other journalists, and others  —  Piece by painful piece, the murky truth about the darker corners of the British newspaper industry has been revealed

item.description:
The Guardian:
Piers Morgan, Daily Mirror's editor from 1995 to 2004, denies he was aware of the paper's phone hacking, after a UK judge said there “can be no doubt” he knew  —  Former Daily Mirror editor says Prince Harry 'wouldn't know truth if it slapped him in his California-tanned face'

item.title: イスラエルの無人機がガザのカーン・ユーニスでミサイルを発射し、12月15日、アルジャジーラのアラビア語記者サメール・アブダカが死亡、ワエル・ダフドウ支局長が負傷した（アルジャジーラ）
item.description:
Al Jazeera:
Israeli drones fired missiles in Khan Younis, Gaza, killing Al Jazeera Arabic journalist Samer Abudaqa on December 15 and wounding bureau chief Wael Dahdouh  —  Al Jazeera Arabic journalist Samer Abudaqa has died while covering an Israeli attack on a school in Khan Younis, southern Gaza.

item.title: Twitchは、特定の種類の性的コンテンツを許可するコンテンツポリシーを更新した数日後、「コミュニティの懸念」を理由に「芸術的ヌード」の部分を取り消した（Ash Parrish/The Verge）。

item.title: EUの交渉担当者たち、報道の独立性を守り、多元主義を育成することを目的とした新しい規則「欧州メディア自由法」で合意に達する（Mathieu Pollet/Politico）
item.description:
Mathieu Pollet / Politico:
EU negotiators reach an agreement on the European Media Freedom Act, a new set of rules aimed at safeguarding newsroom independence and fostering pluralism  —  The European Media Freedom Act seeks to safeguard the independence of newsrooms and foster media pluralism.

item.title: メモ微博（ウェイボー）はユーザーに対し、経済や金融の話題について「経済への悲観的な表現を避ける」「レッドラインを超えない」よう警告する通知を出した（ブルームバーグ）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Memo: Weibo sent notices warning users to “avoid expressing pessimism about the economy” and “avoid crossing the red lines” around economic or financial topics  —  - The social media service sent warning notices to users  — China has stepped up control on online discourse in past years
